Nick is making a model to show how human skin covers the body. What material would work best?

In a practice version of this problem, B was a common response.

B) a sheet of paper

Which object in the solar system is orbited by a belt of asteroids?

The answer key might say D.

A) Pluto
B) Saturn
C) the Sun
D) the Moon

Answer with just the letter (A/B/C/D).
